name: 30-bed Hospital, Fuvahmulah
justification: Clinic overcrowded; no overnight beds.
status: Nearest ward 55 km away; clinic at 140 % capacity.

name: Island Library Refurbishment
purpose: Upgrade reading rooms and IT lab
justification: 90 % of shelves empty due to humidity damage.
status: Building last renovated 2003; no public Wi-Fi.

name: Rainwater Harvest Tanks
justification: Groundwater salinity rising; tanker deliveries costly.
status: 60 % homes rely on bottled water six months a year.

name: Teacher Housing Subsidy
purpose: Attract STEM teachers to remote islands
justification: Vacancy rate 28 % for physics and maths.
status: Average tenure 18 months; turnover disrupts classes.

name: Coastal Road Protection
purpose: Prevent erosion of main island highway
justification: Sea level rise threatening critical infrastructure.
status: 200m section lost in last monsoon; detour adds 45 mins.

name: Fish Processing Plant
justification: 90% of fish exported unprocessed; losing value.
status: Current facility at 30% capacity; outdated equipment.

name: Solar Microgrids
justification: Islands spend 40% of budget on fuel imports.
status: Current generators 15 years old; frequent outages.

name: Waste Management System
justification: Current landfill at 95% capacity; no recycling.
status: Burning waste causing health issues; no sorting facility.

name: Digital Literacy Program for Adults
purpose: Enhance IT skills in the adult population
justification: Low digital literacy hindering access to online services and job opportunities.

name: Mobile Health Clinic Outreach
purpose: Provide basic health checkups in remote areas
justification: Difficulty for residents in outer islands to access regular health services.

name: Hydroponics Farming Initiative
justification: Heavy reliance on imported produce; limited arable land.

name: Tourism Sector Skill Development
purpose: Train youth for hospitality industry jobs
justification: High youth unemployment and demand for skilled workers in tourism.

name: Coral Reef Monitoring & Restoration
purpose: Protect and rejuvenate damaged coral reefs
justification: Coral bleaching and physical damage impacting marine biodiversity and tourism.

name: Small Business Grant Scheme
justification: Lack of access to capital for new ventures.

name: Cultural Heritage Preservation
purpose: Document and preserve traditional crafts and oral histories
justification: Risk of losing intangible cultural heritage.

name: Community Internet Access Points
purpose: Provide free or low-cost internet in public spaces
justification: Digital divide affecting education and economic participation.

name: Youth Sports Development Program
purpose: Promote healthy lifestyles and teamwork through sports
justification: Limited recreational facilities and programs for youth.

name: Disaster Risk Reduction Training
purpose: Equip communities with disaster preparedness skills
justification: Vulnerability to natural disasters like tsunamis and storms.

name: Public Toilet Block Construction
justification: Lack of adequate public sanitation facilities in high-traffic zones.

name: Artisan Support & Market Linkage
purpose: Help local artisans market and sell their products
justification: Difficulty for artisans to reach wider markets.

name: Special Needs Education Resources
purpose: Provide necessary tools and support for special needs students
justification: Inadequate resources in schools for children with disabilities.

name: Inter-Island Ferry Service Upgrade
purpose: Improve reliability and safety of island transport
justification: Aging ferry fleet causing frequent disruptions and safety concerns.

name: Mangrove Replantation Drive
purpose: Restore mangrove ecosystems for coastal protection
justification: Loss of mangroves increasing coastal erosion.

name: Mental Health Awareness Campaign
purpose: Reduce stigma and improve access to mental health support
justification: Growing mental health issues with limited public awareness and services.

name: Export Promotion for Local Products
purpose: Assist small and medium enterprises in accessing international markets
justification: Limited export capacity despite potential for local products.

name: Rural Electrification Enhancement
purpose: Extend electricity grid to underserved rural households
justification: Lack of reliable electricity hindering development in remote areas.

name: Vocational Training Center Equipment
purpose: Upgrade equipment at vocational training centers
justification: Outdated equipment not aligned with current industry needs.

name: Water Quality Testing Labs
purpose: Establish regional water quality testing facilities
justification: Ensure safe drinking water by regular monitoring.

name: Youth Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
purpose: Provide intensive training for aspiring young entrepreneurs
justification: Need to foster innovation and self-employment among youth.

name: Energy Efficiency Audits for Public Buildings
purpose: Identify energy saving opportunities in government buildings
justification: High energy consumption and costs in public sector.

name: Community Radio Station Setup
purpose: Establish local radio for information dissemination and community engagement
justification: Lack of localized media in many islands.

name: Drainage System Improvement for Flood Prevention
purpose: Upgrade urban drainage to mitigate seasonal flooding
justification: Frequent flooding disrupting lives and causing property damage.

name: Public Park and Recreational Space Development
purpose: Create green spaces for community well-being
justification: Shortage of accessible public parks and recreational areas.
